setup_filenames¶

tessilator.tessilator.setup_filenames(file_ref, scc=None)[source]¶

Set up the file names to store data

Parameters:
file_refstr

A common string to give all output files the same naming convention

scclist or None, size=3, optional, default = None

A list containing the Sector, Camera and CCD.

Returns:
con_filestr

Name of file to store contamination values.

period_filestr

Name of file for recording parameters measured by the periodogram analysis.
